resources.string: Imaginary City Guide
Hello blank fragment
Cyprus is located in Western Asia, south of Turkey, west of Syria and Lebanon, northwest of Israel, north of Egypt, and southeast of Greece.\n\nFind below very popular beach sites you should visit.
Cyprus
Also known for its beautiful ocean views
Paris
Popularly known as the city of love

Formidable restaurants in Paris, from the legendary outfit serving grand classics in the Eiffel Tower to swinging sought-after joints where, in true Parisian style, the phone is never answered and the dining room is always full.
Great libraries

What comes to your mind when you hear the word ‘library’? The information it gives, right? While there are people who take libraries as a place to get all the information required, be it for school projects, for personal research or any work assignments. But for many others, it’s a heaven for them to sit and spent hours among books.
Water Parks
Whether you want to enjoy a big splash or a relaxing float, these water-focused resorts and amusement parks offer ample facilities to keep you entertained.
Aquatica (Orlando, Florida)
Aquaventure Waterpark (Dubai, UAE)
Area 47 (Innsbruck, Austria)
Tropical Islands (Krausnick, Germany)
L\'Abeille mixes grand ingredients and plenty of vegetables;rabbit with Swiss chard and truffles.
Pierre Gagnaire provides the stage for a panoply of dishes, from minuscule appetisers; a clam with diced veg – to a whirlwind of desserts.
La Truffière produces excellent, modernised classical French cuisine. The setting is an ancient inn
Les Papilles (\'the taste buds\') originated as wine store and delicatessen known for its delicious, hearty fare in an otherwise touristy area
Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library at Yale University
Stadtbibliothek Stuttgart, Library in Stuttgart Germany
Thomas Fisher Rare Book Library, Library in Toronto Canada
James B. Hunt Jr. Library, Library in Raleigh North Carolina
Larnaca (Larnarka) is a port city on the south coast of Cyprus
Ayia Napa is a Mediterranean resort town on the southeast coast of Cyprus
Limassol is a city on the southern coast of Cyprus
Paphos is a city on the southwest coast of the Mediterranean island of Cyprus
